title: can i get back old stuff on my client?
body:
Is there a way to add deleted maps such as dominion to my client so that i can play it on customs games and such?
On that note is there also a way to add a perma rotating game mode?
what i mean by this is for example having urf mode unlocked on custom games so that i can create custom urf games with friends?
anything i can download that will make any of this plausible ?
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Nope, some maps aren't available unless they are available during our featured game mode on some weekends.  We don't support modifying your account files as it can cause problems, and I definitely don't recommend downloading third party programs as you can't be sure of any malicious contents hiding within.   Check our [third party guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) and be safe!
